description: Running socks that go the distance. These thin and lightweight socks have minimal cushioning for comfort in close-fitting shoes without sacrificing sensitivity.Durable nylon and olefin fabric manages moisture and breathability to keep your feet cool and comfortable.Firm support keeps feet going mile after mile.Midfoot arch band and y-heel keeps socks in place without bunching.Seamless toe for chafe-free comfort.Ultralight cushioning keeps feet comfortable without adding bulk.
name: Swiftwick Aspire One Running Socks - Unisex
